name: Nameless and Silent
description: An exquisite strip table cabinet made from Peach Palm Wood and lined with an elegantly patterned tablecloth. Can be found in the Stadium of the Sacred Flame. It is said that the Stadium's unique interior has caused these tables to serve as filler for empty spaces or as a complement to some other aesthetic, rather than as the main furniture item. However, it has borne these tasks dutifully, just as those who go unnamed and unsung in Natlan itself...
